news.title: Ramadhan Food Distribution Completed
news.description: Alhamdulillah, over 500 families received essential food packages during the holy month of Ramadhan. Thank you to all donors and volunteers!

news.title: ICO Builds New Borehole in Mbale
news.description: Our clean water initiative has delivered its 3rd borehole this year, bringing clean drinking water to over 100 households.
